content.body: Michael Ficarra: did you intend step 5 of https://tc39.es/proposal-iterator-helpers/#sec-iteratorprototype.reduce to be "not present", as in an arguments length check? it is consistent with Array.prototype.reduce, but is generally weirder than just checking for undefined nowadays
content.formatted_body: Michael Ficarra: did you intend step 5 of https://tc39.es/proposal-iterator-helpers/#sec-iteratorprototype.reduce to be "not present", as in an arguments length check? it is consistent with Array.prototype.reduce, but is generally weirder than just checking for undefined nowadays
